data.text: @TIME 50-64% or more water our bodies are. So they want us to believe somehow we can go down percentages to dust? So many things they told us that don't make sense but we go along so we can get IV's for thousands of dollars when a drink of water will do.

@TIME Dehydration. Another fake thing that happens to everyone right? Does their skin get all wrinkly like a prune?  There's no such thing. No one ever dehydrated to death or before they started with the fake diagnosis that Doctors spout all the time. Bodies cannot dehydrate!
@TIME @bostonnewslocal Maybe that giant plastic cowboy hat he wears finally dragged him down?
@TIME Too much alcohol in his system?

@TIME !!PLEASE share.. Any help for my Mommas Dream to come true... I need to get the word out in the world... https://t.co/FFrKF9WXXo
